Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

Happy New Year Everyone! Thank you for your support and see you next year! Fixed a bug where moving the keyframe position may mess up the custom curves. Added 2 new explode particles New Layer 3D Asset Store Simple Explode New Layer 3D Asset Store Particle1 Petal Explode

Happy New Year Everyone! Thank you for your support and see you next year! Fixed the bug where moving the keyframe position may mess up the custom curves. Fixed the bug of discontinuous emission of Particles Embers2 . Added 2 new explode particles New Layer 3D Asset Store Simple Explode New Layer 3D Asset Store Particle1 Petal Explode

Happy New Year Everyone! Thank you for your support and see you next year! Fixed a bug where moving the keyframe position may mess up the custom curves. Added 2 new explode particles New Layer 3D Asset Store Simple Explode New Layer 3D Asset Store Particle1 Petal Explode
Merry Christmas everyone this update adds two new effects: Redesigned a better looking Asset Store Nature Frost . Added New Layer 3D Model Photographic Film .
New Effect: Asset Store Blur Spot Blur . Improved Text layer rendering quality. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Fixed a bug where importing zip files may cause the original files to be deleted.
Redesigned a better looking Bubble Blur . Other bug fixes and improvements.

Now Support Auto Save you can turn it on in the settings page. UI layer will display the icon in the lower left corner. 5 new adjustable sizes have been added to the UI size you can find it in the settings page. Fixed the bug that linear mask not work. Improved Droplets and SnowFlake effects.

Fixed the bug that HDR video can t be imported under iOS 17. New Effect: Asset Store Displacement PolyTrace . Improved Fracture effect Added Physics Triangles parameter. Fixed the bug that iOS version below 12 can t import video.
New Effect: Asset Store Displacement PolyTrace . Improved Fracture effect Added Physics Triangles parameter. Fixed the bug that iOS version below 12 can t import video.
Added Smooth parameter to Glow Scan . Improved the quality of Audio Effect: Reverb . Upgraded some native SDKs helping us to better iterate and update.
Fixed the bug that App freezes on iOS 17. Added 2 new phone model: New Layer 3D Asset Store Model Phone Broken Phone
Now you can export video directly from the project menu. Optimized export crash problem. Improved video decoder encoder performance. Exporting now supports HEVC format
New Effect: New Property Asset Store Nature Star Chain . New Effect: New Property Asset Store 3D Coin . Fixed Asset Store 3D Phone texture ratio bugs. Other bug fixes and improvements.
UI Improved: the name of the text layer will now display the text content for easier identification. Improved Time Interpolation Motion Blur . Other minor bug fixes and improvements.
Added Gradient parameter to Pattern Stripes . Upgraded our native SDK which can bring some performance improvements.
New Effect: New Property Asset Store Nature Snowflake . Other bug fixes and improvements.
Fixed the bug that some special effect parameters cannot be adjusted when the mask is turned on.
New Effect: New Property Asset Store 3D Ocean .
Shape and Mask now supports Distortion . Improved Layer Style Bevel . Fixed a bug where media files were lost when importing a project.
New Effect: New Property Asset Store Displacement Circulate . Added gravity parameter to Fracture effect. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Redesigned New Property Effect Time Echo now the trail is much smoother. Text animations now supports New Property Effect Time effects. Improved UI for iPad. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Redesigned New Property Effect Time Echo now the trail is much smoother. Text animations now supports New Property Effect Time effects. Improved UI for iPad. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Improved for iOS 17. Now supports import ProRes format videos. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.
New Effect: New Property Asset Store Nature Sea Reflection . Fixed the bug that sometimes the project could not be opened.

NV now supports importing and using panoramic textures ! You can use it for the Sky Box or you can use it for the Environment Reflection of the 3D layer. Please check out the built in manual link to learn details.

Improved Asset Store Distortion Turbulent Distortion scaling effect. Layer Timeline alignment supports overlap adjustment. Adjustment Layer supports Blend and Layer Styles now. Optimized performance and reduced crash probability. Custom fonts can now be deleted manually. Improved Asset Store Displacement LED effect.

We updated the underlying framework of NV. In addition the following improvements have been made: 3D New pivot parameter. Improved UI 3D changes are more intuitive. 3D Text supports custom textures. Motion Tracker: Support adding keyframes to correct the position. Path: Redesigned the path parameter UI to support copy and paste. Path keyframes support curves.
New Expression feature! Create a new project and open any parameter menu to find it. Please note this feature requires some programming skills.
Improved Text Animation. In Text layer you can tap Add Animation Preset to add animation component directly. Other bug fixes and improvements.
New: New Property Asset Store Stylize Old TV New Property Asset Store Stylize Flicker Improvement: Particles now supports Noise option Other bug fixes and improvements
Improved Particle System Added Rotation 3D parameter. Added Texture Sheet to Custom Material . Added 7 Simple Particles.
Improved New Property CC Color Grading Added Hue vs Lum and Sat vs Lum curve. Added Channel Mixer option.
New Powerful Free Audio Spectrum Tool : New Property Effect Audio Spectrum . Other bug fixes and improvements.
New Powerful Free Audio Spectrum Tool ! Check out New Property Effect Audio Spectrum to learn more!
New Effect: New Property Asset Store Displacement Tile Rotate . Improved Directional Blur and Ray Blur now supports Turbulence option. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Now you can Delete Settings Delete Custom Fonts in the settings page. Improved Water Reflection the perspective is more realistic. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Improved New Property Text Effect Text Animation : New Random Text animation Improved Glitch effect Improved New Property Asset Store Nature Rain drops : Added speed parameter to trails Added prewarm parameter to trails Improved New Property Effect 3D Particulate : Now supports emit from Alpha channel
bug fixes and improvements.
Brand new New Property Asset Store Shine Rays supports Gradient Length adjusting. New Property Asset Store Nature Water Reflection supports Ripple option. Fracture supports opacity adjusting.
New Feature: Added Opacity parameter to Transform New Effects: New Property Asset Store Distort Bend New Property Fill Ice Caustics Bug fixes and improvements

Improvements: Export audio options supports up to 448kbps Improved audio mixing quality Added Rainbow parameter to New Property Fill Water Caustics Added Direction parameter to New Property Asset Store Nature Snow

Happy New Year Everyone! In this updates we improved the curve editor now you can tweak the elastic bounce parameters! Thank you all for your supports! In 2023 we will continue to work hard to make NV better!
New: New Property Asset Store Nature Frost New Layer 3D Asset Store Snow2 Improvements: Paint Shape now supports Animation Procedural Drawing . Fracture now supports environment reflection.
New: New Property Asset Store Style VHS Improvements: Water Reflection : Added Turbulence Parameters Turbulent Distortion :More Smooth Prism :Added RGB Shift Parameters
New PC effects you ve always wanted: New Property Asset Store Glitch Pixel Sort New Property Effect Time Time Slice Fixed an issue where optical flow not work on reversed clips.
Optical Flow 8.0 is Out! Better slowmo than Ever! Check out the Layer Menu Time Interpolation Optical Flow 8.0 to learn more!
Bug fixes and improvements.
Fixes: 2D transforms are not linked with parent groups. Exported result may not consistent with preview when used Displacement Map or Layer Mask .

New Particles: New Layer 3D Asset Store Particle1 Petals Heart Leaves New Effect: New Layer Fill Pattern Heart Spread Fix Improvement: Fixed glitch issue when 3D layer s Blend Mode is set to Additive New Property Asset Store Distort Jiggle now supports Motion Blur
New: New Layer 3D Asset Store Particle1 Petals New Property Asset Store Distort Jiggle Improvements: Added Speed and Prewarm parameters to 3D particles.
New Feature New Property Time Speed Ramp New Effect: New Property Asset Store Distort Voronoi Distortion Other bug fixes and improvements
UI: Now you can move the layers up or down directly from the TimeLine New: New Property Text Effect Counter New Layer Fill Pattern Dots
UI: Now you can adjust UI size in settings page. Improvements: Added Speed parameter to 3d particles. Added Perspective parameter to Water Reflection Effect. Improved Lens Blur Effect.

New: New Property CC Contrast Adaptive Sharpening New Property Fill Procedural Water Caustics2 New Layer 3D Asset Store Particles2 Bubbles1 New Layer 3D Asset Store Particles2 Bubbles2 New Layer 3D Asset Store Particles2 Feather Bug fixes and improvements.

New: New Property CC Contrast Adaptive Sharpening New Property Fill Procedural Water Caustics2 New Layer 3D Asset Store Particles2 Bubbles1 New Layer 3D Asset Store Particles2 Bubbles2 New Layer 3D Asset Store Particles2 Feather
Bug fixes and improvements.
Fixed an issue where effect masking not working.
NodeVideo is now able to open .zip archives. When you open .zip files you can choose NodeVideo to import them as project packages. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Fixed video loading issue on iOS 16 Fixed Gaussian Blur masking not working Fixed Motion Tracker not working

Improvements: In the following cases the text layer and the shape layer can be created infinitely without crash: When the 3D transform switch is turned on for the text layer. After creating a new shape layer continue to click New Shape at the bottom of the property panel. New: New Template UI now you can replace assets easier. Added star shape. Added heart shape.

In version 5.0 we upgraded the entire underlying framework of NV which will help us to upgrade and iterate better. In addition we also updated the following features: Realistic water reflection: New Property AssetStore Nature WaterReflection . Added Random Color to text animation. Now you can directly add New Property Fill on layers for example you can directly add the Water Caustics effect on the text layer. 2D text layer can add Fracture and Extrusion effects now.
Better Saber Effect: New Property Asset Store Shine Saber Path Bug Fixes and improvements
Improvement: Pinch Bulge now supports feather parameter. New: New Property Asset Store Displacement Halftone
Fixed an issue where keyframes were inconsistent when loading presets and copying effects New MINI Tool: HD
New Effect: New Property Asset Store Displacement Brick
Bug fixes and improvements
New Property Effect 3D Particulate . Max to 10K particles! Requires Pro. Fixed an issue where 3D particles are not facing camera.

New UI Layer Manager supports multiple selection which is convenient for managing complex projects. You can find it on the layer menu bar. New Effect New Property Asset Store Stylize Bump Map . Bug fixes and improvements.
New UI Layer Manager supports multiple selection which is convenient for managing complex projects. You can find it on the layer menu bar. New Effect New Property Asset Store Stylize Bump Map .
bug fixes and improvements
New: Text3D and Custom Model now supports Reflection Environment Fixes Improvements Fixed Copy Effect bugs Improved Lens Blur and Shape Blur Effect
New: New Property Asset Store Blur Shape Blur New Property Asset Store 3D Phone
Realistic Ripples: New Property Asset Store Nature Random Ripples Other bug fixes and improvements.
Hello everyone based on your feedback we have improved Transform More Motion Blur : Blur from the first frame There will also be a blurring effect on the edges
Redesigned New Property Effect Layer Styles Now supports Outline Glow Inner Glow Shadow Long Shadow Bevel.

Improvements: Lens Blur Slow supports new shape: Star New Effects: New Property Asset Store Lighten Soft Glow New Property Asset Store 3D Sphere New Property Asset Store 3D Cube New Property Asset Store 3D Cylinder New Property Asset Store 3D Ring New Property Asset Store 3D Heart New Property Asset Store 3D Octahedron New Property Asset Store 3D Star
Bug fixes and improvements.
New: New Property Asset Store Glitch Pixel Sorting New Property Asset Store Stylize Page Curl
UI: Landscape UI supports left hand and right hand mode you can find it in the settings panel. New Effect: New Property Asset Store Nature Heat Wave Bug fixes and improvements.
Added Copy All Effects option to the property menu. New Effect: New Property Asset Store Distort Wave Warp supports sine triangle square etc. Deprecated Twist Effect please use Wave Warp instead.

New Effects: New Property Asset Store Distortion Scale Wipe New Property Asset Store Distortion Smear Improvements: Saber effect supports a new distortion type voronoi Custom Model and Extruder supports light direction
Fixed a bug that sometimes UI jumps to different layers.
Added layer alignment function including align left align sequential and align right. You can find the alignment menu on the right corner of the time line panel.

Added 6 new glitch effects: New Property Asset Store Glitch Wave Glitch New Property Asset Store Glitch Block Glitch New Property Asset Store Glitch Line Glitch New Property Asset Store Glitch Jump Glitch New Property Asset Store Glitch Wind Glitch New Property Asset Store Glitch Prism Glitch Deprecated the old glitch effects please use the new effects instead. Added 2 new displacement effects: New Property Asset Store Displacement Random Shift New Property Asset Store Displacement Tile Shift
Brand new LUTs New Property Color Correction LUT You can even import custom .cube files. Bug fixes
Optical Flow 7.0: Faster Less Artifacts
New MINI project: Rainy
Fixed a bug sometimes jumping to different layer when opening the curve editor.
New Easy Powerful Shake Effect: New Property Effect Shake Bug fixes.
Bug fixes and improvements for the new curve editor.
Brand new curve editor! Simple and easy to use. If you are more used to the old editor you can switch back to full mode manually.
New Text 3D Layer! Even supports text animation! Please Add New Layer Text 3D to get start!
New Effect: New Property Asset Store Stylize Old Film Supports Spot Scratch Fiber Grain Flicker Shake Fully adjustable. New Property Asset Store Nature Snow .
Fixed some text animation bugs. Redesigned New Property Asset Store Distortion Lens Distortion Now supports radius dispersion adjustment.
New MINI package: My Planet

New: New Property Text Effect Text Circular Warp New Property Asset Store LightSweep now supports Distortion can be used to make fancy lighting effect with Text layer. Fixed an issue where text layer filling with texture not working properly.
Improved Unsharp Mask Fixed black edges on Lens Blur Slow Fixed an issue where nested groups time line can t be edited.
Fixed an issue where Effects: Rain Drop Saber Edge Frozen can t be loaded.
New Particles: New Layer 3D Asset Store Particle2 Digital Rain1 2 3 4 Minor bug fixes and improvements

For professional motion graphic designers a new powerful flexible text system! Please New Layer Text and then New Property Text Effect Text Animation for this layer. Then you can stack any animation in the animation list bar and change the evolution parameter to make the animation move. Check out our Youtube channel Node Video to get sample projects! Fixed zooming issue.
Fixed bugs that may be caused by long duration videos: Editing lag Stretching cannot be maximized Fixed an issue where some effects may get lower quality after exporting. Unsharp Mask Lens Blur Slow

Improvements: Curve editor will automatically scale vertically to fit the current keyframes in screen. It is useful for dense keyframes editing. Tap the trim icon in the timeline can trim to current time indicator. Other bug fixes and improvements.
New Realistic Lens Blur: New Property Asset Store Blur Lens Blur Slow Fix: Fixed Multiple Camera key frames not working. Fixed MINI Project Leg Stretch problem need to re install app.

In this version we ve redesigned our rendering pipeline which brings these advantages. 2D: Text Shape 3D will no longer be displayed as groups which is very confusing. Transfrom Effects will not be cropped by group now. Pivot Linking should be correct now. 3D: Multiple Cameras supported. Just New Layer 3D Camera to create a camera group it will rendering its 3d children separately and then be composited as a 2D layer. Skybox supported. Currently only Gradient and Flare Upgrade your old projects: This version is not backward compatible If you encounter problems please flow below guidance: You may need to adjust 3D layers transform manually. Text and Shape layer now have no masking effect. You need to create another Layer Mask then set its source to your Text or Shape.
New Property Asset Store Displacement Hexagon Now supports dissolve shading etc. Just twist the Dissolve parameter you can see a fancy shiny effect. Inspired by user: Aynxt Minor bug fixes
Fixed crop issue on 1:1 ratio.

New: Video Crop is now supported. You can find it in Transform more Crop . You can use crop to scale in specific area without quality drop. New Property Color Correction Soften Improved: New Property Color Correction Unsharp Mask
Fixed bugs for iPhone 13 Pro: UI lags delays
New: New Property 2D Animation Liquify Improvement Optical Flow now supports Remove Duplicate option which can remove duplicated frames in video and get smoother result.
Optical Flow Changes: Removed Smart Blend Option Added Edge Denoise and Force Continuous option Other Bug fixes.
Optical Flow 5.0 Stronger Faster

New Effects: 1. Realistic raindrops New Property Asset Store Nature Rain Drops 2. Screen Rain Effect New Property Asset Store Nature Rainy Fixes: 1. Pen Tool Mask Tracking issue 2. Gaussian Blur Masking issue 3. Undo issue
New Effects: 1. New Property Asset Store Nature SaberEdge You can apply saber to layers with Alpha channel 2. New Property Asset Store Displacement Hexagon
Fixed crash after pick media.
8 new color themes you can find them in the settings page located on the top right corner . Refactored our codes for further updating.
1 Important Change: Now all the effects are under New Property Asset Store category. 2 Fixes Improvements Text layer shows white blocks. 3D layer supports Alpha Clip now.
Improved UI color New Effect: New Property Asset Store Glitch3 New Property Asset Store Stylize Code
1 New: New Property Effect Time TimeWarpRGB New Node 3D Asset Store Particle ButterFlies 1.2.3.4.5.6.7 2 Long press bookmark to delete all bookmarks 3 Fixed 3D transparency issue
Bug Fixes: Custom font not rendering. Motion blur not working. Transform Link broken issue.

1 New Beat Tool you can use it to make various music effects. You can find it in the Audio property panel. You can also find it in the MINI Mode. These feature is super useful we ll add tutorial later! 2 Transform now supports Link With You can link it with NULL object Adjustment layer to make complex transitions. 3 Added back property Copy and Paste option.
Fixes an issue that may cause the exported video corrupt.
1 New Effects: New Property Asset Store Light Rays . 2 Bug fixes and improvements.
1 New LightSweep Effect New Property AssetStore LightSweep 2 Fixed potential crashes.

1 Properties support Preset function which greatly simplifies the workflow. Open the menu of any property panel you can find the preset option 2 Now the Transform property can directly enable the Tiling function which will bring the following benefits: No longer to add Motion Tile property. Tiling is connected with transform It s more convenient to make transitions.

1 New Feature: New Node Adjustment Layer 2 New Particles: New Node 3D AssetStore Particle Turbulence New Node 3D AssetStore Particle Lines 3 Improvements Asset Store Rays supports Dispersion can be used to create rainbow rays. 4 Bug fixes

1 Improvement New Property Asset Store Rays supports Dispersion now. 2 Fixed some major bugs Splitting video layer may cause app crash and projects are gone. Potential bugs which may cause app crash. Potential bugs which may cause projects disappear.
1 New Effects: New Property Color Correction Unsharp Mask Better sharpen result. New Property Asset Store RGB Displacement . 2 Bug fixes and improvements.
1 Optical Flow 4.1 Improved motion blur. Frame mix now is enabled when motion blur is on. 2 Slow motion supports up to 50 times slowdown. 3 Bug fixes and improvements.
Supports Importing custom 3d models .fbx .obj . Animations are also supported! New Node 3D Import Please check out http: www.nodevideo.com guide custommodel.html to learn more.
Optimized preview speed and memory consumption. New Property 2D Animation Polygon Deform Can be used to make eye close animation custom deformation etc. New Logo
Added Turbulent Distortion: New Property Asset Store Turbulent Distortion So many users requested this feature..

Supports Audio Effects Now! Requires Pro New Property Audio Effect Low Pass New Property Audio Effect High Pass New Property Audio Effect Low Shelf New Property Audio Effect High Shelf New Property Audio Effect Pitch Shifter New Property Audio Effect Reverb Moved New Property Color Grading to New Property Color Correction Color Grading
Added Sine wiggle type to wiggle editor you can use it to make regular shakes. Improved motion tracker. Bug fixes and improvements.
Advanced Optical Flow is Here! Top Rank High Accuracy Even compare with PC! No quality loss on videos! Free!

New: Text layer supports path warping ! Fix: Important Fixed quality loss in some videos darkening blurring . Added Edge Width to Motion Tile You can use it to get rid of border edges. Added Random Seed to Wiggle Editor. Improved Timeline Editing.
Brand new motion tracking system! Supports rotation and scale tracking. Smoother and more stable. Curve editor supports vertical zooming pinch two fingers in or out .
Fix the problem that time remap cannot add key frames

This version brings the following improvements: Optimized the memory usage when exporting should increase the upper limit of layer count. Optical flow 3.1 better frame mix. Added export quality option very high . It s not recommended unless you really need it. Added Fade in effect for text animation This can make glow animation with Glow Scan . Improved the Glow Scan and Bling effects.
Particle System supports custom texture now! Just crate any particle New Node 3D Particles then check on the Custom Material option.
NV Motion Blur is out! Check out the Time Interpolation Optical Flow to learn details. Online Documentation:
New Node 3D Particles Triangles New Node 3D Particles Embers3 New Node Fill Audio Visualization Line Added new parameter to particles: random position Bug fixes and improvements

Pen Tool supports Trim Path Anti Aliasing is now supported. Shape layer and text layer should have more smoother edges. The following features are free for a limited time for 1 month Pen Tool Hue Saturation Curve
New Effect :Face DIY Check out the Face DIY MINI project or add New Property Effect NV Lab Face DIY to learn more
New Effect: New Property Asset Store Stylize Old Movie2 . New Effect: New Property Effect Distortion Squeeze . Bug fixes and improvements.

Fixed an issue where timeline inside group is not correct. Fixed a potential crash bug on exporting. In this major version we bring you a revolutionary feature: MINI Mode ! Check out this page to learn details: http: nodevideo.com guide nodemini.html Motion blur supports Dispersion .
In this major version we bring you a revolutionary feature: MINI Mode ! Check out this page to learn details: http: nodevideo.com guide nodemini.html Motion blur supports Dispersion .

Super powerful fracture system: New Property Effect 3D Fracture . Supports import HDR video. Puppet Pin supports 3D rendering. We are preparing for the next major version 2.0 so there may not be a update in the next one month. Thank you for your support.
Physically based breaking effect: New Node 3D Break Window . Bug fixes and improvements.

New Effect: New Node Fill Asset Store Radial Rays . UI: Video layer supports trim you can find it next to scissors in the timeline menu. UI: Curve editor supports grid display and snap. Improve Glow effect now supports Preserve Alpha . Improve 3D layer supports per layer blending and transparency adjustment. you can find them in the Transform property.

Audio now supports left and right channel editing. Fixed an issue where 3D groups with 2d child layer are not rendering. Fixed the bug that slide down the media picker the loading screen won t disappear.

3D rendering supports depth test the global camera will automatically detect the occlusion between layers. Note that the old project may need to readjust the z pos. Fixed the problem that the template code cannot be imported. Fixed the problem that slomo video cannot be imported. Improved the Pen Tool UI. Pro icon will no longer be displayed in Pro version.
Fixed a potential bug that sometimes project can t open. Added anchor option to Motion Tile effect.

In this update we added 2 new free effects for gaming video. Hope you like it! 1 Brand new Ripple Effect Full adjustable New Property Asset Store Ripple . 2 Counter Animation Create a new Text layer tap Text Animation then select Counter . 3 Support import custom 3D LUT Add a new Color Grading Property then tap the menu icon on the top right . 4 Simplified the project resolution option.

New Effect: New Property Asset Store Bling New Effect: New Property Asset Store RGB Radial New Mask: New Property Mask Layer Mask . You can set other layer as mask now. New Text Animation Type: Position Rotation not compatible with old text layer. Bug fixes and improvements.

Removed the splash screen Added an audio monitor at the bottom of the UI which can display audio changes during playback New Effect: New Property Asset Store Light Trail Need to create a path and play New Effect: New Property Asset Store RGB Blur If you have any feature requests or suggestions please let us know through the Feedback page in the app.

Now supports 4K export Requires new project Optimized the memory usage when exporting now there should be no crashes when exporting multiple layers Curve editing supports separate display of XYZ making it more convenient to edit 3D curves App will automatically lock the device rotation after 5 seconds after startup

Optical Flow 2.0! Better result on time interpolation. Optical Flow is still under improvement when it is perfect enough we will launch per pixel motion blur and 3D tracking! Happy new year everyone in 2011 we will continue to work hard to bring better experience and more features! Thank you all for your support.
Improved memory usage on exporting. Text Layer now supports: Outline Glow Shadow Bevel. UI bug fixes and improvements.

Merry Christmas Everyone! In this version we brought you one of the most frequently requested feature: 3D Extrusion! Hope you enjoy it! Extrude any Text PNG into 3D! Check out our Youtube channel to learn details. Bug fixes and improvements.
Fixed the memory issue which causes app crash. Now the previewing will not consume any memory please update this version.
Convert any Text PNG to saber! Check out our Youtube channel to learn how to use. Supports custom font now requires pro. Fixed the audio synchronization issue.
Prefetch available. It can boost the previewing speed a lot! You can find it in the layer menu. New Effect: New Property Asset Store Glow Scan .

Fixed a potential bug that project save failed and becomes unusable. New Industry Level Color Grading. New Property Color Grading Improvements Simplified the parameter UI. Shape mask now supports tracking. Previewing speed improved by around 10 . This is still a major task we ve been working on Thank you for your support and being patient.

New Industry Level Color Grading. New Property Color Grading Improvements Simplified the parameter UI. Shape mask now supports tracking. Previewing speed improved by around 10 . This is still a major task we ve been working on Thank you for your support and being patient.

Fixed potential crash on app launching. This issue seems only happens in some Arabic iPhones. If you still can t open NodeVideo please send an email to: contact nodevideo.com. We can offer you free pro membership. Thanks

This update is mainly optimized for iOS14: No longer need album reading permission Picking media supports multiple selection The picked video will not be compressed We strongly recommend you upgrade to iOS14 for a better experience.
New: New Property 2D Animation Flow New Node 3D Particle Embers2 New Node 3D Particle Ashes Please check out our Youtube channel to learn details.

New Waveforms Histogram for an accurate color grading process. Now the tracker UI will show a status bar indicates which frames are tracked. New Effect: New Property Asset Store Stretch Segment Improvements Memory usage improved
Saber: Fixed hard edges when start end offset changed. UI: Improved the subscription page now you can see what pro features you would get in this page.
New Saber Effect! Please checkout New Node Saber to learn more. This effect is 100 free.
Minor bug fixes and improvements. We will release Saber in the next week please stay tuned!
Fixed an issue where using puppet pin on photos would get a wrong quad shape.

New: Professional 2D Animation Tool Puppet Pin !Please check out our youtube channel to learn details. Tool Path New Property 2D Animation Puppet Pin . Fixes: Fixed an issue where some videos are forced to speed up.
Performance and stability improvements
NEW: Text Animation! Please checkout New Node Text Text Animation to learn more! FIX: Fixed an issue where timeremap and slow down not work.
Improved seeking accuracy. Other minor bug fixes and improvements.

Improvements: Greatly improved performance for Playing Exporting. We will continue to work hard to make it faster. New features: Mask Tracking. You can use it to blur pixelate moving objects easily. Please follow our youtube channel to learn details. Motion Tracking now supports Affine type.
Fixes: Sometimes project file is corrupt and can t open. Time Interpolation Optical Flow not working since 1.4.0.

New features: Get Help page in home menu you can find tutorials contact information there. UI for Rectangle and Ellipse shape. Fixes: Can t cut audio clips accurately. Last few audio data is missing when exported. Improvements: Curve editing for scaling. Better result of Color Correction Hue Saturation Curve
New: Video Stabilizer New Property Tracker Stabilizer please check out our youtube channel to learn more. Improvements: Exporting speed improved by around 50 . Improved Optical Flow frame blending.

New: Time Interpolation Super Slow Motion !! Frame Blend Optical Flow Full GPU Accelerated. Please checkout our youtube channel to learn how to use. https: www.youtube.com watch v WKiCnzJ_dcQ Fixes Improvements: Fixed issue that can t change FPS after project created. Playing Speed improved by around 10 .
Improved the curve editor now it should be much easier to edit. New effect: New Property Asset Store Fire . Bug fixes and improvements.

Fixes Improvements: Fixed various bugs with per frame editing: PenTool Keyframes sometimes messed up when keyframes are too close. Can t update keyframe value when keyframes are too close. Curve value not accurate when keyframes are too close. UI: Zoom on keyframes now are synchronized with the time line. Landscape mode Clip trim icon will only be showed when selected. Motion Tile now supports motion blur. New: New Property Effect Distortion Twist .
Fixes: Fixed a memory leak. 3D group can add mask now. UI: Now audio waveform will be showed in the timeline.
A new LOGO Some bug fixes and improvements
Brought back the app manual It was deleted by mistake in the last version 1.3.3 .
New Effects: New Property Asset Store Prism1 New Property Asset Store Prism2 New Property Asset Store Ray Tracing Glass Cube UI: Full Screen Editing is now supported in landscape mode.
Some fixes and improvements for UI. New Effect: New Property Asset Store Frost .
Bug fixes and improvements.

Changes: NO ADS ANYMORE. This app is built and maintained by 3 young programmers in China. We don t have any marketing resources in foreign countries and we apologize for the lack of tutorials. If you are making tutorial videos please contact us we can introduce your social account to other users.

New: Ray Tracing 3D: New Property Ray Tracing Glass Sphere . New Property Ray Tracing Crystal Sphere . New Property Ray Tracing Diamond . Fixes Improvements: Adding key frames while playing is now supported. Performance and stability improvements.
New: New Property Asset Store Ripple . Fixes Improvements: Performance and stability improvements.

New: Media infomation panel. You can find this option on the layer menu. Fixes Improvements: Replaced Lens Flare Textures with high resolution ones. Iris adjusting is also supported now. Chroma Key supports alpha clip now. Some bug fixes and improvements.

Fixes: Fixed audio glitch problem while playing. Fixed some other major bugs. New: Added 15 new professional lens flare effects please check out New Node Fill Lens Flare to learn more. Added FAQ in the About page.
Fixes: Fixed some crashes. New: New Node Fill Audio Visualization LED .

Fixes: Fixed Glitches while seeking HEVC format videos. Fixed an issue where sometimes timeline and preview are not synchronized whiling editing parameters. Improved: Color Mask now supports Refine denoise blur .

New: Project Explorer. Supports Sort by Time Size Name List Grid View Duplicate Export Project as Zip Import Project Zip . New Property Effect Stylize RepeTile . Useful for creating repeat patterns. New Node Fill Audio Visualization Energy . Fixes: Minor bug fixes and improvements.

Fixes: Fixed some bugs and crashs on 3D Rendering. New Effects: New Node Fill AssetStore Water Caustics New Node Fill AssetStore Speed Line New Node Fill AssetStore Stripes New Node Fill AssetStore Glowing Rays New Node Fill AssetStore Grid

New: New 3D Rendering Pipeline. 3D Layer Depth Test Parenting Motion Blur are supported now .Please check out the 3D example or our Youtube channel to learn more. Fixes Improvements: Some bug fixes and improvements.

New: Template QRCode. by which you can encode your project to the exported video and share them conveniently. In Export menu Check on the append template option then your project code will be appended to the exported video. In Home menu you can load template by click Load Template button. Fixes Improvements: Some fixes and improvements for landscape UI.

New: Timeline audio scrubbing is now supported. Painting directly on mask is now supported. Fixes Improvements: Fixed a crash on PenTool Masking. Improved UI Zooming. Changes: Deprecated New Node Paint Please use New Node Shape then set shape type to Paint instead.

New: UI now supports landscape orientation. Just turn your device sideways to check it out. Please make sure the portrait orientation Lock is set off on your device. Fixes: Fixed an issue where Color Wheel is not working.

New: Motion Tracking. Yep we ve made another breakthrough for iPhone. please checkout New Property Tracker Motion Tracking to learn more. Or you can also checkout our youtube channel to learn the tutorial. Changes: Temporarily removed the watermark until we get through this pandemic. please feel free to make your own video. Minor bug fixes and improvements.
New: Paint Layer. blazing fast supports animation! checkout New Node Paint to learn more. Jump single frame is now availbale just expand the bottom time line menu you will see the button.

New: UI Now a Screen Magnifier window will show up while dragging UI handles. New Property Asset Store Flare . Pro is required. New Shape is available: Linear. Fixes Improvements: Greatly improved UI performance especially for undo redo. Fix for issue where Blur for PenTool is not working.

Changes: Simplified PenTool keyframing. Now uses Path keyframing instead of per point keyframing. Please note the PenTool data in older version will lost. We are very sorry for this inconvenient. PenTool now requires Pro. Fixes Improvements: Fixed bezier curve editor more flexible and accurate now. Improved Gaussian Blur s Performance Quality.

For some reason the Lifetime Pro IAP in last version has been sent back so we have to resubmit a new version. For release notes please refer to v 1.1.2. Improved UI layout for iPad. Minor bug fixes and improvements.

New Tool: Sequencer Tool. You can use it to cut video easily check out New Node Tool Box Sequencer to learn more New Effects: Dissolve pack more than 20 different advance dissolve effects. New Property Asset Store Dissolve Rays. New Property Asset Store Rays Also added a Dissolve Explosion example to demonstrate these two effects above you need to reinstall the app to get the example. New IAP: One time purchase option is available now get it early to save your money! Fixes Improvements: Improvements and bug fixes around time line editing.

New Effects: Perspective Transform New Property Effect Distort Perspective Transform Twirl New Property Effect Distort Twirl Fixes Improvements: Improved wiggle for paired parameters eg the x y of position will be wiggled in a random phase. Improved Lens Distortion Effect. Fixes for potential crash after undo. Removed unskippable AD when exporting is finished... Please give us a good review Thanks. Deprecated: Will be removed in the future New Node Fill Gradient please use Layer Styles instead. New Property Effect Distort Radial Distort please use Lens Distortion instead.

New: Skew New Property Effect Distort Skew Layer Styles New Property Layer Styles Also deprecated old layer styles in Shape and Text. Redesigned the node menu added 2 new tools: Capture and add as Node and Capture and Save . Motion Tile supports motion blur now Fixes Improvements: When pick video from gallery no compression will be added to the video now. Improved UI perform Improved UI for iPad. Other minor bug fixance. es and improvements.

New: Pen Tool. Yep we ve made another breakthrough for mobile devices...please check it out in below locations: 1 New Node Shape Shape Type Pen Tool 2 Any Effect Mask Shape Type Pen Tool 2 New Property Shape Mask Shape Type Pen Tool Fixes Improvements: Improved ChromaKey both green color and blue color are supported now. Added a very professional Color Correction example reinstall the app to learn more. Minor bug fixes and improvements.

New: New Property Effect Time Echo New Property Asset Store Glitch1 New Property Asset Store Glitch2 New Property Asset Store Water New Property Asset Store Rain Drops Fixes Improvements: Fixed White Balance of Basic Color Correction and added Sharpen parameter. UI Improved the polygon path editor now it should be easier to key frame the points.

New: Particle System: Snow Rain Embers. Parameters are fully adjustable as always you can even make particles dance with audio reactor. Please try New Node 3D Particle or checkout the new Audio Visualization example to learn more need to reinstall the app . All examples now include a video tutorial you can see it directly in the example project. need to reinstall the app . Fixes and Improvements: Fixed some transparency issues: Shape Mask Luma Fade Emboss . Fixed an issue where the first frame of the exported video is black. Added Clip Mask option to the Effect Mask Tool. UI Added Center controller in mask tools. UI Improved Zooming controller.

New: 1 Professional Color Masking Tool Try New Property Mask Color Mask to learn more. You can use it to replace colors in the video eg. change cloth colors. 2 Audio Visualization Bars Try New Node Fill Audio Visualizer or checkout the new example to learn more need to reinstall the app. 3 Shape Mask You can apply shape mask to Node directly now try New Property Mask Shape Mask . We are pretty sure by combining these effects with audio reactor you can create stunning effects never seen before. For example change a dancer s cloth color with the audio then apply a Glow effect on it. Detail tutorials will come soon please stay tuned!
Fixed crashes while loading project that contains masked Color Correction effects.

New New tool available: Effect Mask. you can now apply mask to effects directly by clicking mask button in property header. Improvements and Fixes UI Expanded Keyframes s touch area when dragged on screen edge. Audio Expanded audio bands from 26 to 31 ISO standard . Audio Audio reactor smoothing should work properly now. Effect BasicCorrection Fixed black noises when exposure is too high. Effects Fixed all effects alpha clipping behaviour now effects should work properly on transparency layers. AD Reduced AD show up frequency.

New Feature: Expanded audio bands from 12 to 26 now the audio reactor should be more sensitive. Added a color picker to pick color from screen. New Effects: Mask Chroma Key ColorCorrection Tint Terms of use updated: NodeVideo Examples are not allowed to export due to license restrictions. Bug fixes and improvements.
New Feature: Added a search bar for effect searching. New Effects: Effect Color Correction Basic Color Correction Exposure Contrast White Balance etc. Effect Stylize Emboss Fill 4 Color Gradient
Minor bug fixes and improvements. New effect: Luma Fade.
